title: T3 Turkey Red Bob Rhoades PSA 3

posts.post_title: T3 Turkey Red Bob Rhoades PSA 3
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bob C

Arguably the most difficult card in the set. 
Fantastic eye appeal front and back. One of the nicer specimens I have seen.
$999.00 delivered insured.
Paypal OK.
Emails take precedence.
Thanks for looking.
